title: I replaced Animal Crossing's dialogue with a live LLM by hacking GameCube memory
author: vuciv
aiHeadline: Hacker injects modern AI into ancient GameCube, proving that even dinosaurs can evolve.

title: I didn't bring my son to a museum to look at screens
author: arch_deluxe
aiHeadline: Parent outraged: Museum screens are ruining the experience, but what did they expect? A live exhibit?

title: Charlie Kirk killed at event in Utah
author: david927
aiHeadline: Prominent figure meets unfortunate end at event, proving that even in Utah, life can be full of surprises.

title: Pontevedra, Spain declares its entire urban area a "reduced traffic zone"
author: robtherobber
aiHeadline: Spain takes a bold step towards utopia by banning cars, proving that progress is possible, even in traffic.

title: ChatGPT Developer Mode: Full MCP client access
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: OpenAI drops the mic with Developer Mode, giving coders full control over ChatGPT, proving that with great power comes great responsibility... or just more headaches.
